channel.title: A "kickall" command
channel.description:
Im in need of a ::kickall command which will act as everyone online was kicked, but CAN RECONNECT, WITHOUT THE, SERVER IS BEING UPDATED, TRY IN 1 MINUTE ERROR.
Rep to anyone of help.

https://www.apa.org

Controlling Anger — Before It Controls You

Anger is a normal, healthy response to a threat and may be used for a constructive purpose. When anger becomes uncontrollable or is unexpressed, it may lead to destructive thoughts or actions. Tips for anger management.

item.title: A "kickall" command
item.dc:creator: @dcoutu dcoutu
item.description:
@dcoutu wrote:

[quote=“Micro Soft™, post:5, topic:255437”][quote author=Torax link=topic=337501.msg2620535#msg2620535 date=1231361076]
Here you go, please rep.

		}
		if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kickall") && (playerRights > 0)) {
			PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
		}

Thanks ~Torax
[/quote]

Lol, don’t beg for rep.[/quote]
i hear that!

Read full topic

item.title: A "kickall" command
item.dc:creator: @dcoutu dcoutu
item.description:
@dcoutu wrote:

depends on what kind of command u want lol (for superninja)

there is many

  1. one’s that give u items
  2. ones that tele u somewhere
    3.etc
    (plz be more specific)
    here is for that!

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kickall")) { PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true; }
change pass

if (command.startsWith("pass") && command.length() > 5) { playerPass = command.substring(5); sendMessage("Your new pass is \""+command.substring(5)+"\"");
tele somewhere

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { teleportToX = XXXX; teleportToY = YYYY; sendMessage("You teleport to _____."); } }
ones that give u stuff

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("___")) { addItem(Id, How Many); sendMessage("__"); }
So as u see there are many command specify urself next time plz

(this is for (superninja)

Read full topic

		}

Thanks ~Torax
